data.eml:eml: Bodotria jejuensis sp. nov. (Crustacea, Cumacea, Bodotriidae), a new Korean cumacean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chang-Mok, Kim, Sung-Hyun, Kim, Young-Hyo (2016): Bodotria jejuensis sp. nov. (Crustacea, Cumacea, Bodotriidae), a new Korean cumacean. Zootaxa 4161 (3): 357-366, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4161.3.4
